Summary: Three orbs drifting slowly downwards, disappearing and reappearing in diff areas.
divs: Sighting DetailsThree, sometimes 4 orbs. Drifting slowly toward earth, appearing and disappearing, and trading places suddenly. These were EXACTLY like others I have seen posted recently, usually formed in a triangle, but sometimes 4 would form a square. A quick check of YouTube show kids also saw them at the skatepark at the same time.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were 2 other sightings in Longmont on or around December 7th 2012
